about_the_game:
Bring your game world to life in crisp pixel art with these RPG tiles. This pack includes new environment tiles for cold areas such as a winter forest, ice cave and snow village.

Created in the iconic retro style of Time Fantasy series, this fun-sized pack is a great addition to your growing RPG Maker library.

Features:
  • New tiles to expand on the Time Fantasy style.
  • Autotile terrain, including animated water for different ground types.
  • TileA5 wall tiles for exterior cliffs as well as icey caverns.
  • Three object-layer tile sheets (winter wilderness/snow cave, tree/forest and snow town).
  • For use with RPG Maker VX Ace or the engine of your choice
